post.description: Use this call to add or update a free text refund. This method can also be used to change the refund amount for any pending manual refund. Please check any automated refunds are valid prior to calling this method. Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to refund shipping for an order. Please check the refund options to ensure that a shipping refund is possible. Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to update pending manual refunds to the actioned state. Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to refund one or more services on an order. Please check that any automated refunds are valid prior to calling this method. Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to check if it is possible to do an automated full-order refund. Rate limit: 150 / minute

get.description: Use this call to get information about manual/automated refunds (which kinds of refunds are possible) for a given order. Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to get a list of service items which can be refunded. Rate limit: 150 / minute

parameters.name: pkOrderId
parameters.description: The id of the order which the service items belong to.

get.description: Use this call to retrieve the total value of refunds against an order. Rate limit: 150 / minute

parameters.name: includeBookings
parameters.description: If true, pending refunds against return bookings and exchange bookings will be included. (Optional, default is false.)

post.description: Use this call to determine if the refunds in a given return set are valid. Rate limit: 150 / minute

get.description: Use this call to determine if validation of refunds or returns/exchanges with refund components is required for a given order. Rate limit: 150 / minute

parameters.name: pkOrderId
parameters.description: The order id of the order which requires validation

get.description: Use this call to get a list of valid channel refund reasons for a given order. These are needed for channel refunds. Rate limit: 150 / minute

parameters.name: pkOrderId
parameters.description: The order id to get reasons for

get.description: Use this call to get a basic list of returns, exchanges and resends for an order. Rate limit: 150 / minute

parameters.name: pkOrderId
parameters.description: The order id to get the returns for

get.description: Use this call to get a list of all items on an order, including return quantities and resend quantities. The information can be used to calculate how many items has already been returned. Rate limit: 250 / minute

parameters.name: pkOrderId
parameters.description: The order id to get the returns for

get.description: Use this call to get basic information about a processed order (e.g. source, subsource, address) as seen on the Returns/Refunds screens. Rate limit: 150 / minute

parameters.name: includeRefundLink
parameters.description: Is a refund link required (not available for all channels).

get.description: Use this call to retrieve detailed information about a processed order (header level). Rate limit: 250 / minute

post.description: Use this call to retrieve detailed TrackingURL for orders Vendor and TrackingNumber. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ProcessedOrdersNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Search Processed Orders Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ProcessedOrdersNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to search for processed orders. Rate limit: 150 / minute
Download Processed Orders to CSV Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ProcessedOrders.DownloadProcessedOrdersNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to add a new return category. Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to rename an existing return category. Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to delete an existing return category. Rate limit: 150 / minute

get.description: Use this call to get a list of related orders. Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to get split packaging information for an order Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to get an order's audit trail information Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to retrieve a list of order-level extended properties. Rate limit: 250 / minute
Use this call to retrieve a list of return categories. Used for refunds, resends and exchanges. Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to get a list of order notes for a given order Rate limit: 150 / minute

post.description: Use this call to add a new note to an order Rate limit: 250 / minute
Edit an existing order note Rate limit: 150 / minute
Delete an existing order note Rate limit: 150 / minute
Creates a resend Rate limit: 150 / minute

get.description: Gets all refund order items for an order Rate limit: 150 / minute
Checks if order was fully returned Rate limit: 150 / minute

pkOrderId.description: The id of the order to add/update refunds for
The id of the order whose shipping needs to be refunded
The id of the order to action refunds on.
The id of the order to refund services for.
The id of the order to validate the refund with

request.description: Search parameters consisting of keyword, dates, filters and sorting.

from.description: The lower end of the date range to search. Can be null if searching for 'all dates'. Maximum range is 3 months.

to.description: The upper end of the date range to search. Can be null if searching for 'all dates'. Maximum range is 3 months.

searchField.description: The field to search by. Can be found by calling GetSearchTypes.

exactMatch.description: Set to true if an exact match is required for the search data.

searchTerm.description: The term which you are searching for.

pageNum.description: The page number of the request.

numEntriesPerPage.description: The number of entries required on a page. Maximum 200.

request.description: Request parameter populated with search criteria for the file download

categoryName.description: The name of the category to add.

pkItemId.description: The id of the category to be renamed.

newName.description: The new name for the category.

pkItemId.description: The id of the category to delete.

isInternal.description: True if the note should be internal, False if it shouldn't
Whether the note is an internal note

exchangeItems.description: A list of items to be exchanged, including quantity, scrap, refund, etc.

despatchLocation.description: The id of the location to despatch replacement items from

returnLocation.description: The id of the location to return stock to

channelReason.description: Channel reason - required if a refund on the channel is required

channelSubReason.description: Channel subreason - required if a refund on the channel is required.

isBooking.description: True if it is a exchange booking, False if it is a new exchange

ignoredValidation.description: True if failed validation has been ignored (see IsRefundValid). Otherwise, false. When set to true, refunds will not be automatically actioned on the channel. Ignored if creating a booking as a refund is not created at this stage.

pkOrderId.description: Order ID that needs to be resend

despatchLocation.description: Location ID where from resend be despatched
